revised_title: Further Observations on the Effects of Trypanosomata in Gambia Fever and Sleeping Sickness on Rats
tldr: The authors investigate the effects of trypanosomata from Gambia Fever and Sleeping Sickness on rats, discovering that the presence of the parasites in the blood does not always lead to paralysis. They also observe that the site of inoculation determines the location of paralysis in affected rats.
